Package edu.ntnu.Backend.controller

Class AuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.controller.AuthenticationController
@RequestMapping("/api") @RestController @CrossOrigin public class AuthenticationController extends Object
A controller for the authentication api calls of the backend.

  • Method Details

    • loggingIn

      @PostMapping("/login/authentication") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> loggingIn(@RequestBody LoginDTO loginDTO) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, javax.servlet.ServletException, IOException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      A method to authenticate the login of a user to the queue system.
      Parameters:
      loginDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See LoginDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity containing ether a generated token if the login is successful, or a http status bad request if the login is not successful.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      IOException
      javax.mail.MessagingException
